getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Gets the name of this event handler.

Returns:
the name of this event handler

getType

public int getType()
Gets the type of this event handler. Valid types are: Mi_ORDINARY_EVENT_HANDLER_TYPE Mi_SHORT_CUT_EVENT_HANDLER_TYPE Mi_MONITOR_EVENT_HANDLER_TYPE Mi_GRAB_EVENT_HANDLER_TYPE

Returns:
the type of this event handler

processEvent

public int processEvent(MiEvent event)
Processes the given event.

Parameters:
event - The event to process
Returns:
Mi_CONSUME_EVENT if no other event handlers should see this event Mi_PROPOGATE_EVENT if other event handlers can also see this event

getRequestedEvents

public MiEvent[] getRequestedEvents()
Gets an array of events that can be processed by this event handler.

Returns:
an array of events that this event handler is interested in.

getRequestedCommands

public java.lang.String[] getRequestedCommands()
Gets an array of command names that can be processed by this event handler. Command names can be generated from translations of input events, default translations of which are specified by the event handler. Many event handlers use this methodology to support a mapping from specific events to commands. In this way, the event handlers process the commands, not events. However the event handler will often look at the current event stored in the event handler to get additional (i.e. positional) information.

Returns:
an array of comands that this event handler is capable of processing
See Also:
addEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String, com.swfm.mica.MiEvent), setEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String, com.swfm.mica.MiEvent), removeEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String)

isPositionDependent

public boolean isPositionDependent()
Gets whether this event handler only want events that occur within the bounds of any MiPart is assigned to. Otherwise this would be a 'global' or 'window-wide' event handler.

Returns:
true if only want events that occur within the bounds of the MiPart it is assigned to.

isSingleton

public boolean isSingleton()
Gets whether this event handler is copied and assigned along with the part that it assigned to when the part is copied.

Returns:
true only if this eventhandler is not to be copied. Default is false.

addEventToCommandTranslation

public void addEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String command,
                                         MiEvent event)
Adds a translation from the given event to the given command. When the event is received by this event handler it will generate the given command and send it to the processCommand method.

Parameters:
command - the command to translate the event to
event - the event to translate
See Also:
setEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String, com.swfm.mica.MiEvent), removeEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String)

setEventToCommandTranslation

public boolean setEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String command,
                                            MiEvent event)
Sets (replaces) the translation for the given command to now be generated from the given event. When the event is received by this event handler it will generate the given command and send it to the processCommand method. Only the first translation found is modified.

Parameters:
command - the command to translate the event to
event - the event to translate
Returns:
true if a translation was modified
See Also:
addEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String, com.swfm.mica.MiEvent), removeEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String)

removeEventToCommandTranslation

public void removeEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String command)
Removes the translation that generates the given command. Only the first translation found is removed.

Parameters:
command - the command whose translation to remove.
Returns:
true if a translation was removed
See Also:
addEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String, com.swfm.mica.MiEvent), setEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String, com.swfm.mica.MiEvent)

removeEventToCommandTranslation

public void removeEventToCommandTranslation(MiEvent event)
Removes the translation that involves the given event. Only the first translation found is removed.

Parameters:
event - the event whose translation to remove.
Returns:
true if a translation was removed
See Also:
addEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String, com.swfm.mica.MiEvent), setEventToCommandTranslation(java.lang.String, com.swfm.mica.MiEvent)

copy

public MiiEventHandler copy()
Returns a copy of this MiiEventHandler.

Returns:
the copy

setTarget

public void setTarget(MiPart part)
Sets the MiPart that this is assigned to. This is set when this is assigned to a part.

Parameters:
part - the target part

getTarget

public MiPart getTarget()
Gets the MiPart that this is assigned to. This should be used insetad of any local references to the target.

Returns:
the assigned to part

setPropertyValue

public void setPropertyValue(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String value)
Sets the property with the given name to the given value. This is useful for changing the events that triggers a command.

Parameters:
name - the name of an property
value - the value of the property

setObject

public void setObject(MiPart part)
Sets the part which is targeted by this event handler. Used for grabs to indicate what coordinate system all delivered events should be in.

Parameters:
part - the part targeted by grab event handlers

getObject

public MiPart getObject()
Gets the part which is targeted by this event handler. Used for grabs to indicate what coordinate system all delivered events should be in.

Returns:
the part targeted by grab event handlers

setEnabled

public void setEnabled(boolean flag)
Sets whether this event handler is enabled.

Parameters:
flag - true if enabled

isEnabled

public boolean isEnabled()
Gets whether this event handler is enabled.

Returns:
true if enabled
